# VEHICLE::DISABLE_PLANE_AILERON

## Summary
Disable movement of aileron and effect handling

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle: Index, whether you want to effect the left or right hand aileron(facing from back of plane), enable or disable aileron control
* **BOOL** leftSide
* **BOOL** disable

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Disable or re-enable the planes ailerons(large flaps on wings) Can be used to prevent movement and to effect the handling of a plane
